ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: NC_INVITE_ONLY_SIGNUP env is not working with 0.100.2
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ? - [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this ### Steps to reproduce ? - run with the flag set to true - signup as super admin - signs up - signup as a new user without invite - signs up (shoud not) note: - toggling the value in account > settings made the thing work. ### Desired Behavior . ### Project Details 0.100.2 ### Attachements _No response_
